headline: XRP 'correction isn’t done yet,' analyst sees more pain ahead
summary: The crypto market has gone through a wild month as nearly all the cryptocurrencies have lost 20%-30% of their value during the period. XRP, the third-largest cryptocurrency by market cap, has also lost 20% in a month as it trades at $2.34. Though Ripple's recent partnership with Mastercard led to a ...
